html: The sensational @SamSmithWorld will be bringing his #ThrillOfItAll tour to SA in April 2019! Don’t miss this incredible artist – tickets are expected to sell fast! 13 & 14 April at @Ticketprodome 16 & 17 April at @GrandWestSA Presented by @947, @KFMza, @MNet & @Channel24
text:
The sensational @SamSmithWorld will be bringing his #ThrillOfItAll tour to SA in April 2019! Don’t miss this incredible artist – tickets are expected to sell fast!  
 
13 & 14 April at @Ticketprodome
16 & 17 April at @GrandWestSA

Presented by @947, @KFMza, @MNet & @Channel24

html: Farewell Mrs Franklin. You may have left this world but your music walks through our lives with us, getting us through, healing our broken hearts, teaching us how to love ourselves. Like a bridge over troubled water x
text: Farewell Mrs Franklin. You may have left this world but your music walks through our lives with us, getting us through, healing our broken hearts, teaching us how to love ourselves. Like a bridge over troubled water x

html: Every year I listen to your voice more than I did the year before and like an old friend the bond I have with your talent and music gets deeper and deeper...
text: Every year I listen to your voice more than I did the year before and like an old friend the bond I have with your talent and music gets deeper and deeper...

html: Aretha. Where do I start? Your voice and your spirit and soul has leaked into my heart and mind and spirit since I was a child. One of the very first songs I remember hearing as a human was ‘I say a little prayer’...pic.twitter.com/8vOebR5Af8
text: Aretha. Where do I start? Your voice and your spirit and soul has leaked into my heart and mind and spirit since I was a child. One of the very first songs I remember hearing as a human was ‘I say a little prayer’...pic.twitter.com/8vOebR5Af8

html: I wasn’t gonna post for a few weeks, but just found out we hit 10 MILLION FOLLOWERS ON INSTAGRAM!! Celebrating in the ocean today love you all.. This cyber love is strong xpic.twitter.com/kZDmCk9bmv

html: Thank you for such a special first half of our North American tour. Me & my entire team have made memories that we will never forget. I’m going to have a little social media break for a few weeks now. I’ll see you in Saint Paul on the 14th of August!! I love you all very much pic.twitter.com/I2VEfnfwix
text: Thank you for such a special first half of our North American tour. Me & my entire team have made memories that we will never forget. I’m going to have a little social media break for a few weeks now. I’ll see you in Saint Paul on the 14th of August!! I love you all very much pic.twitter.com/I2VEfnfwix
